sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useCart } from '../context/CartContext'; const Cart: React.FC = () => { const { cart, loading, updateQuantity, removeItem, clearCart } = useCart(); if (loading && !cart) { return (
Loading...
); } if (!cart || cart.items.length === 0) { return (

Your cart is empty

Add some delicious items to get started!

Browse Products
); } return (

Shopping Cart

{/* Cart Items */}
{cart.items.map((item, index) => (
{/* Product Image & Info */}
{item.product?.image_url ? ( ) : (
)}
{item.product?.name}
SKU: {item.product?.sku}
${item.price_at_addition.toFixed(2)}
{/* Quantity Controls */}
{item.quantity}
{/* Total & Actions */}
${(item.price_at_addition * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}
))} {/* Cart Actions */}
Continue Shopping
{/* Order Summary */}
Order Summary
Items ({cart.total_items}) ${cart.subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Shipping FREE
Total ${cart.subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Proceed to Checkout

Secure Checkout

); }; export default Cart;
